name: Dot Bounce In Circle- Free Endless Color Game Mode
name_original: Dot Bounce In Circle- Free Endless Color Game Mode
description:
Use your eyes, ears, and reflexes to keep the ball within the spinning circle. Try to time it so that the ball hits the circle when the colors match.

Think you've mastered it? Think again! The circle will begin moving and spinning faster and faster. See how many you can get then share your score with your friends!
